edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer

Class SimpleTranscript

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer.SimpleTranscript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transcript

    public class SimpleTranscript
extends Object
implements Transcript
    Provides mechanisms for accessing a transcription.
